name: ListStarredRepos
description:
Retrieve repositories starred by a user on GitHub.

Use this tool to get a list of repositories that a specified GitHub user has starred, including the option to find out when stars were created.

parameters.name: github_user_handle
parameters.description: The GitHub user's handle (username) to retrieve starred repositories for.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: sort_repositories_by
parameters.description: Property to sort the repositories by: 'created' for star date or 'updated' for last push date.

value_schema.description: The property to sort the results by. `created` means when the repository was starred. `updated` means when the repository was last pushed to.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specify the direction to sort the results: 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: The direction to sort the results by.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of repository results to return per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number of the results to fetch, useful for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
